title: 作战地图包3现在已在所有主机平台上线
author: 六月奈
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-9-2 06:45 编辑 

预览视频地址：https://youtu.be/bh2E6p4ptoI

Posted on Sep 1, 2016 by Owen Hill
Owen Hill发表于2016年9月1日

Hello! 大家好！

We’ve recently released Map pack 3 for Battle - our free, combat-focused mini-game - on all console editions of Minecraft. It includes three new locations for you to take on your friends and enemies and costs a cool $2.99 or equivalent.

我们最近在所有主机平台上发布了免费的战斗小游戏地图包，它包括了三个新的地点让你可以带上你的朋友或者敌人，它足足价值2.99美元或者其他等值的


First, there’s Castle that will have you jumping off ramparts, climbing ladders, and engaging in hand-to-hand combat on huge banqueting tables majestic halls.
首先，那里的城堡会使你跳下城墙，爬上梯子，然后在举行宴会的雄伟大厅里参与白刃战般的战斗。

Invasion is a modern city that’s been destroyed by an unknown presence. The crashed UFOs hint that aliens might be involved, but who knows? Maybe that Herobrine chap had something to do with it.
入侵就是一个现代的城市被未知的存在所摧毁。坠毁的UFO暗示着外星人可能参与了其中，但是谁知道呢？说不定HeroBrine这小伙子曾经用它做过什么。

And, finally, Shipyard - a city build around an airship suspended miles above the ground. A truly epic location and a great place to prove your might in combat. Keep your eyes on the prize and don’t look down!
还有最后，造船厂 —— 一个环绕着一架飞艇的城市，悬停在地面数千米之上。一个真正史诗级的场所和一个伟大的地方能够让你证明你在战斗。保持你的视线盯着奖品，别往下看！

Have fun playing Battle, people! And (even even thought the mode is about thwarting your enemies) be nice to your fellow crafter!
祝大家在体验战斗中玩的开心！还有，记得对你的同伴好一点！（尽管你的目标是阻挠你的敌人）

Owen - @bopogamel
